meanings.definition: To look at something closely or with interest.
meanings.sent1: She pickeered at the tiny ant crawling on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The child pickeered at the colorful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: As she pickeered at the painting, she noticed a hidden signature.
meanings.sent4: His eyes pickeered over the map, searching for the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The detective pickeered at the clues, trying to solve the mystery.

meanings.definition: To have a quick glance or peek.
meanings.sent1: He pickeered out the window to see if the mail had arrived.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel pickeered at the bird feeder before darting away.
meanings.sent3: She pickeered at the menu, trying to decide what to order.
meanings.sent4: The cat pickeered around the corner before pouncing on its toy.
meanings.sent5: The curious child pickeered through the keyhole to spy on the secret meeting.
